data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Valladolid, Castilla y León, Spain.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Valladolid, Castilla y León, Spain
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 403,223 people in the county of Valladolid who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.section_summary: On average, 41 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Valladolid, Castilla y León, Spain.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, show your mercy on the 524,072 people in Valladolid who are far from you. Please add 106 new house churches this year.
Father, help your children in Valladolid, Castilla y León, Spain find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Moor people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Moor people know you.
Lord, to the people of Valladolid you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 8,528 believers in the county of Valladolid.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Valladolid, Castilla y León, Spain to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 524,072 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood
